title: plushie skins
body: I love how terrifying the creatures of the void are but can you make a skin that would make them cute plushie stuffed creatures. I think it would we cool to see a bug {{champion:121}}  leaping in and hearing adorable noises while he assassinates you. Maybe you could make  huge monster like {{champion:31}} adorable while he eats you so he will no longer the terror of the void.

replies.body:

> Still pretty scary I say.

Agreed. MONTY PYTHON 4 DA WIN!

(Has anyone noticed that the characters made a '*large wooden **rabbit***' as a trojan horse while they were storming the french castle?, and that the scariest thing in the entire movie was either a castle of prostitutes or a **killer rabbit**?)
